text: 20:6 1 Pita 2:9; Akar Mogomem 1:6; 2:11; 20:4Eghtɨ, gumazamizir God ua bagha inabazir faragha dɨkaviziba, me guizbangɨra bar akuegham. Me Godɨn gumazamizibara. Ovever namba 2, me iniamin gavgaviba puvatɨ. Me God ko Kraisɨn ofa gamir gumazamizibar ikiam. Egh Krais ko 1,000plan azenibar atrivibar ikiam.
